SENT.plain: Two hundred and eighty six subjects with cardiovascular diseases and 147 healthy newborns were studied
P53 codon 72 polymorphism was determined by DNA analysis
The association between BMI and diabetes depends on p53 polymorphism: Odds Ratio shows a high significant association between BMI and diabetes in *Arg/*Arg subjects (p=0.00001)
No significant association is observed in *Pro allele carriers (p=0.203)
